techmeme.title: San Jose-based DreamBig, which develops chiplet platforms and was founded in 2019, raised a $75M equity round co-led by Samsung Catalyst Fund and Sehat Sutardja (Chris Metinko/Crunchbase News)
Source: in an informal inquiry, the US FTC has asked Amazon to provide more details on its deal to hire top executives and license tech from AI startup Adept (Reuters)
Google Search Labs is ending its Notes experiment, which debuted in December 2023 as a way to let users leave "helpful tips about an article" directly on Search (Abner Li/9to5Google)
Elon Musk says that X's headquarters will move to Austin, after he protested a new California law that bans schools' transgender notification policies (Laura Waxmann/San Francisco Chronicle)
Andrej Karpathy, an OpenAI co-founder and former head of Tesla's autopilot unit, unveils Eureka Labs, a "new kind of school" aiming to support teachers with AI (Akash Sriram/Reuters)
